annotations.description: The Aviation was created by Hugo Ensslin, head of the Hotel Wallick in New York City sometime in the early 20th century. We don't have an exact date. We do k...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Aviation

textContent:
1.75oz Gin
.75oz Lemon juice
.25oz Maraschino
.25oz Creme Yvette

Stir and pour
Garnish with cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g2IVh4lr1HA

---

2oz Gin
.5oz Maraschino
.75oz Lemon juice
.25oz Creme de Violet

Shake and pour
Garnish with cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZkC50vRcJ1k

---

2oz or 60ml Gin
.75oz or 20ml Lemon Juice
3/8oz or 10ml Maraschino Liquer
3/8oz or 10ml Creme De Violet
shake/strain/coupe
Garnish: Luxardo Cherry

Shake and pour

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VzNGwmMpBjU
title: Aviation
